content: If you thought that was the extent of his moves, you'll be in for a nasty surprise. Perhaps you've been wondering ever since defeating Buddha's Right Hand where the other hand went? Turns out, it's inside Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
If you thought that was the extent of his moves, you'll be in for a nasty surprise. Perhaps you've been wondering ever since defeating Buddha's Right Hand where the other hand went? Turns out, it's inside Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw!
